add_firmware(bytes32,string,string,strin.details: Called by developers to add a new firmware to the contract.

params.IPFS_link_: IPFS link to download the firmware
params.firmware_hash_: Hash of the firmware using SHA-3
params.stable: Firmware type: LTS or Latest Version
